title: 4.06- The Second Commission
itunes:title: 4.06- The Second Commission
description: The Second Commission was supposed to implement the Law of April 4 and defeat the slave uprising. This turned out to be harder than they thought.
content:encoded: The Second Commission was supposed to implement the Law of April 4 and defeat the slave uprising. This turned out to be harder than they thought.
